main.name: Lava Spike
main.oracle_text: Lava Spike deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
main.flavor_text: Some kami attacks during the war were rife with trickery, subterfuge, and subtlety, draining hope and pride from the mortal world. Other attacks were a lot more straightforward.

card.name: Ghitu Lavarunner
card.oracle_text: As long as there are two or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, Ghitu Lavarunner gets +1/+0 and has haste.
card.flavor_text: Tolarians teach the theory of pyromancy. The Ghitu prefer applied research.

card.name: Thermo-Alchemist
card.oracle_text:
Defender
{T}: Thermo-Alchemist deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap Thermo-Alchemist.
card.flavor_text: "Madness can't touch a mind ignited by genius."

card.name: Chain Lightning
card.oracle_text: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to any target. Then that player or that permanent's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, they may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

card.name: Lava Spike
card.oracle_text: Lava Spike deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
card.flavor_text: Some kami attacks during the war were rife with trickery, subterfuge, and subtlety, draining hope and pride from the mortal world. Other attacks were a lot more straightforward.

card.name: Lightning Bolt
card.oracle_text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.
card.flavor_text: The sparkmage shrieked, calling on the rage of the storms of his youth. To his surprise, the sky responded with a fierce energy he'd never thought to see again.

card.name: Needle Drop
card.oracle_text:
Needle Drop deals 1 damage to any target that was dealt damage this turn.
Draw a card.
card.flavor_text:
"First it was plovers and mulldrifters. Now it's knitting needles the size of javelins."
—Calydd, kithkin farmer

card.name: Searing Blaze
card.oracle_text:
Searing Blaze deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, Searing Blaze deals 3 damage to that player or planeswalker and 3 damage to that creature instead.

card.name: Rift Bolt
card.oracle_text:
Rift Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.
Suspend 1—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Skewer the Critics
card.oracle_text:
Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Skewer the Critics deals 3 damage to any target.
card.flavor_text: Going to a Rakdos show is dangerous. Trying to leave early can be fatal.

card.name: Fireblast
card.oracle_text:
You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Fireblast deals 4 damage to any target.
card.flavor_text: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.

card.name: Curse of the Pierced Heart
card.oracle_text:
Enchant player
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, Curse of the Pierced Heart deals 1 damage to that player or a planeswalker that player controls.
card.flavor_text:
"May your veins weep, and may every vampire take notice."
—Stensian curse

card.name: Forgotten Cave
card.oracle_text:
Forgotten Cave enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
Cycling {R} ({R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Electrickery
card.oracle_text:
Electrickery deals 1 damage to target creature you don't control.
Overload {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

card.name: Martyr of Ashes
card.oracle_text: {2}, Reveal X red cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Ashes: Martyr of Ashes deals X damage to each creature without flying.
card.flavor_text: She turns ash into flame and burns enemies to ash.

card.name: Molten Rain
card.oracle_text: Destroy target land. If that land was nonbasic, Molten Rain deals 2 damage to the land's controller.
card.flavor_text: It came as a cruel answer to the farmers' prayers.

card.name: Smash to Smithereens
card.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact. Smash to Smithereens deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller.
card.flavor_text: The giant Tarvik dreamed that trinkets and machines caused all the world's woe. When he awoke from his troubled sleep, he took the name Tarvik Relicsmasher.

card.name: Flaring Pain
card.oracle_text:
Damage can't be prevented this turn.
Flashback {R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
card.flavor_text:
"I don't rub salt in wounds. I use sulfur."
—Matoc, lavamancer

card.name: Keldon Marauders
card.oracle_text:
Vanishing 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
When Keldon Marauders enters or leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

tokens.name: Tome of the Infinite
tokens.oracle_text: {U}, {T}: Conjure a random card from Tome of the Infinite's spellbook into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell."
